elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "The formation of political opinion".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What do you mean by the word "opinion"?
elements.correctAnswer: An opinion is what someone thinks about something. An opinion is something personal, a matter of opinion.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Which groups shape an individual's opinion?
elements.correctAnswer: Reference groups, face-to-face groups and the family shape an individual's opinion.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Why does the family have the strongest influence on an individual's opinion?
elements.correctAnswer: Because the opinion of family members is often heavily weighted.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What is the significance of the mass media?
elements.correctAnswer: The mass media has a strong influence on opinion formation. Many people find out about what is happening in the world through mass media such as radio, newspapers, TV and social media and thus learn about certain points of view.
